alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Inland Franklin (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 2:18PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Franklin County through 300 PM EDT... At 217 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Carrabelle to near St George Island. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, St George Island, Eastpoint, Apalachicola, Franklin, Carrabelle Beach, Morgan Place, Saint Teresa, Turkey Point, Royal Bluff, Mcintyre, High Bluff, Yent Place, St George Island St Pk, Green Point, Bay City, Lanark Village, Apalachicola Airport, Creels and Hays Place. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
